summary: THE CONSUMER HAS EXPERIENCED THE FOLLOWING:  STEERING WANDERS/CONSTANT, MUST HOLD THE VEHICLE IN THE MIDDLE TRAVEL LANE/ALSO ON ROUGH ROADS, WINDY CONDITIONS, AND WHEN BEING PASSED BY TRUCKS (INCREASED COMPENSATION REQUIRED).  THIS MAY CONTRIBUTE TO THE FATIGUE AND EXCESSIVE TIRE/COMPONENT WEAR.    TSB#1298/BSN 147-COACHMEN AURORA MOTORHOME  SCC
